frame.name: Inclusion
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Total</fen> has a <fen>Part</fen>, either as a member of an aggregate or as a constituent part of a simple entity.
<ex><fex name="Total">His collection</fex> <t>included</t> <fex name="Part">two El Grecos</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Total
FE.definition:
<def-root>A complex entity, either an aggregate or a unit, of which a <fen>Part</fen>, a constituent or a component, is specified.
<ex><fex name="tot">His collection</fex> <t>included</t> two El Grecos</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Part
FE.definition:
<def-root>A component or constituent that is specified to form part of the <fen>Total</fen>.
<ex>The larger album <t>includes</t> <fex name="par">designs for his house at Whitehall</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates the purpose for which some implicit (non-expressed) agent causes the inclusion of the <fen>Part</fen> within the <fen>Total</fen>. <ex>This electronic transmission <t>includes</t> encryption protocols <fex name="pur">in order to prevent outside surveillance</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the frequency with which the <fen>Part</fen> is included int he <fen>Total</fen>. <ex>Software packages <fex name="fre">often</fex> <t>contain</t> promotional items.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Contrast_set
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates other elements that are included within the <fen>Total</fen>. <ex>This book <t>includes</t> <fex name="con">among other things</fex> three chapters on macroeconomics.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Subregion
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE indicates the sub-location of the <fen>Total</fen> in which the <fen>Part</fen> is included.
<ex>This plan <t>includes</t> <fex name="sub">within the final stage</fex> three separate sub-stages.</ex> <ex>My list <t>contains</t> four names <fex name="sub">in the final section</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The Explanation denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows. </def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the inclusion event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (quietly, loudly), and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). </def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Total</fen> includes the <fen>Part</fen>.
<ex><fex name="tim">Last year</fex> the recognized departments <t>included</t> the Russian and East European Institute, and the Office of International Programs.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The location at which the <fen>Total</fen> includes the <fen>Part</fen>.
<ex><fex name="pla">In California</fex>, the category <t>excludes</t> minors and the mentally ill.</ex></def-root>
